alert.note: Alert for Brooke; Hancock; Marion; Marshall; Monongalia; Ohio; Wetzel (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 27 at 11:55PM EDT until July 28 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 9 PM EDT TODAY... * WHAT...Heat index values up to 104 expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central Ohio. Portions of northwest, southwest, and western Pennsylvania. Portions of northern and the northern panhandle of West Virginia. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 9 PM EDT Today. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Brooke; Hancock; Marion; Marshall; Monongalia; Ohio; Wetzel
